title: So, umm... A friend made a video about my gameplay.... (Must see)
body:
If you're looking for a good Laugh involving League, you'll definitely  find it here.. Add me in game to help all you can.  :/  Bless you.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8yJyI_XILCI&feature=youtu.be

IGN: **I love elo hell **

replies.body: omg, i can't even.  This is too hilarious.

This is amazing. I gagged. I laughed. I cried. 

I'm surprised you haven't been {{champion:119}} out of the game yet by some toxic player regardless of whether or not you've been {{champion:24}}ed up gameplay wise. Hope you're {{champion:103}}t and that one day you can blossom into {{champion:12}} player. Wishing you the best of {{champion:99}} so you can {{champion:13}} to the field.
This pretty much sums up my feels.
I see you like puns. Maybe you would like to pun on my {{item:3025}}.

Welp, at least you almost got Fiddlesticks.

P.S.: Where do I donate?
You donate by adding I love elo hell and carrying him through a game, every game carried brings us closer to a Rage Free League.
Should I laugh or feel terrible? I guess I'll laugh and then feel terrible.
Those poor poor players.  My heart is breaking for them.
This really hit home for me. My brother teamed up with I love elo hell just last week. He hasn't been the same since...
Please help all you can, guys.. :S IGN: I love elo hell. Help our community, don't let another poor gamer be over-fed.
Just played a game with I love elo hell... *sigh*...........
